text:
[Verse]
Golden petals touch the breeze
Sunflowers dancing through the field
Blue sky stretching endlessly
Nature's beauty just revealed

[Verse 2]
Birds above us singing sweet
Melodies in tune with light
Every step a sunny beat
Day to night and night to bright

[Chorus]
Sunflowers in the sky
Reaching high up to fly
Feel the joy as they sway
Sunshine leading our way

[Verse 3]
Raindrops kiss the leaves at dawn
Morning glows with dew so clear
All the gloom has long been gone
Sunshine whispers in our ear

[Verse 4]
Fields of yellow guide our path
Every smile a new delight
Find the magic we once had
Nature's wonder in our sight

[Chorus]
Sunflowers in the sky
Reaching high up to fly
Feel the joy as they sway
Sunshine leading our way
title: Sunflowers in the Sky
